title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Photon version of the Java editor, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler is not appearing when right-clicking. This menu is supposed to allow users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc should appear, but it does not.
EB: The popup menu in the Java editor ruler should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Verify that the popup menu does not appear.
